question: Which is the venue of the civil aviation exhibition and air-show ‘Wings India 2020’?
explanation:
The civil aviation exhibition and air-show ‘Wings India 2020’ has commenced in the capital city of Telangana, Hyderabad. 
It is a biennial event organised by the Federation of Indian Chambers of Commerce & Industry (FICCI), Ministry of Civil Aviation and the Airports Authority of India (AAI). The event was planned to be held for four days but was later reduced to a two-day event from March 12-14.
